html:
Experience the thrill of Wheel of Fortune and win big with every spin! Our online slot games offer a variety of exciting prizes, and you can cash out any of your winnings anytime. All you have to do is find different symbols, including sports cars, emerald jewels, and private yachts. 

Next, take your gameplay to the next level with our exciting bonus rounds, including the Wild Bonus, Mini Wheel Bonus, Wheel of Fortune Bonus, and the Triple Extreme Spin Bonus - your chance to win big! With some of the best bonus games in the industry, you'll be sure to have an unforgettable gaming experience. 

So what are you waiting for? Spin the wheel and see where fortune takes you! Play Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins for free and discover why it is one of the most popular online slot games in the US. 

A TV show graphic 

Get ready for a luxurious gaming experience when you play Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins for free! Our online slot game features symbols that capture the glitz and glamor of the original Wheel of Fortune show. Unravel glittering jewels, cruise liners, sports cars, and even tasty fruit pieces as you spin the wheel for your chance to win big. 

But don't discount the "minor" symbols - even they can return a payout thanks to our innovative MultiWay system. With every spin, you'll have the chance to win big and experience the thrill of the game just like the everyday Joe and Jane who played the original show. 

This IGT slot game boasts 720 ways to win thanks to MultiWay, offering players a chance to win big with every spin. Match three or more pieces of fruit for a payout ranging from 5 to 125 coins, while three or more sports cars could land you up to 300 coins. Aim for the big leagues by landing three or more cruise ships for up to 1000 coins, or try your luck with five Wheel of Fortune logos for the ultimate jackpot of 10,000 coins. 

With winning combinations spun both left to right and right to left, this game keeps the action going. It doesn't rely on flashy graphics or a specific theme, instead focusing on the thrill of the spin and the excitement of hitting those bonus rounds. 

Slot Machine Features and Symbols 

This slot game offers 720 different ways to win. Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins is designed specifically for high-level players, with a top prize of 500,000 coins. The minimum bets are higher than usual, but the potential prizes are much larger, making it a game worth playing for those seeking big payouts. 

Although the game is called Wheel of Fortune, you’ll need a truckload to carry your winnings. The pay table reveals all the potential winning combinations for slot games. According to the pay table for this game, wins start by matching a few traditional retro symbols, including cherries, plums, and apples. Finding between 3 and 5 matching symbols can pay up to 125 coins. 

When you match other exciting symbols, such as sports cars, emerald jewels, and luxury yachts, you win serious prizes on the Wheel of Fortune slot game. You can win up to 300 coins for sports cars, 400 coins for emerald jewels, and 1,000 coins for luxury yachts. These prizes can significantly boost your bank balance until you can trigger the game's brilliant bonus rounds. 

Watch out for the bonus symbols Wild, Mini Wheel Bonus, Wheel of Fortune, and Triple Wheels Bonus Symbols, which trigger the game's bonuses. Wild symbols will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 and can substitute for all base symbols in the game to create prizes. Three Mini Bonus Wheel Symbols will trigger the Mini Bonus Wheel, where you can win between 50x and 3,850x the value of the coins you are playing. Find 5 Wheel Of Fortune Bonus Symbols and instantly win 10,000 coins. Keep an eye out for the Triple Extreme Spin Bonus symbols, as these will trigger the Triple Extreme Spin Bonus, during which you will be asked to pick envelopes (one for each symbol that triggers the game) to reveal how many spins of the blue reels, red and yellow you will get. The blue wheel rewards 30x – 1,000x the coin value. 

It's often said that fortune favors the brave, and that's especially true when you Play Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins for free. If you're feeling lucky and brave enough to spin the reels, you could be rewarded with fantastic prizes that will keep you on the edge of your seat. With a range of exciting bonus games and special features to trigger, as well as the innovative MultiWay feature that can create wins from even the most innocuous of spins, Wheel of Fortune: Triple Extreme Spin is a thrilling and potentially lucrative game that caters to both high-level players and those who enjoy racking up consistent profits. So, if you're ready to take a chance and win big, Wheel of Fortune: Triple Extreme Spin is the perfect game for you! 

Other Similar Slot Machines 

IGT's Wheel of Fortune: Hawaiian Getaway is another addition to the highly successful Wheel of Fortune slot games series. More than a dozen branded titles, some with fixed or progressive jackpots, have been released on casino floors and online casinos. Each has distinctive characteristics that strongly resemble the television game show, which first aired in 1975.
meta_title: Play Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins for free and Win
meta_desc: Looking for a fun slot game where you can win huge prizes? Play Wheel of Fortune Triple Extreme Spins for free and enjoy the ultimate gaming experience.
